title: Interpretation of a dream about a candle and its meaning in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a candle by Ibn Sirin A candle in a dream can be a symbol of goodness, as it helps in seeing and lighting. Whoever dreams of lighting a large number of candles, this indicates a long life. Extinguishing candles in a dream indicates the worries and problems that the dreamer is going through. If one sees in a dream that he receives a glowing reputation from someone, this indicates strength and reputation. Seeing someone losing candles in his town is a sign of happiness that must be found. Interpretation of a dream about a candle by Al-Nabulsi Seeing a candle with few clicks is a sign of lawful money that the fortuneteller obtains after hardships. A rich candle for the poor is a gift for the ignorant. Seeing a candle in a dream from a poor person is evidence of his wealth and gaining a lot of money. If anyone sees a dream If one extinguishes the candle in his hand, this indicates the envy that he is exposed to. Seeing a candlestick is a sign of good luck. Seeing a candlestick made of silver, gold or pottery is a sign of bad luck. Dreaming of blowing out candles means goodness and the disappearance of worries and problems. Interpretation of a dream about a candle for a man Seeing a bright candle in a dream indicates To a new stage in a man's life and happy events to come. See the wax inside the dream It indicates engagement and marriage. Seeing a candle in a married man's dream is evidence of righteous children. If a person dreams of a candle in his house and lights it, this indicates the livelihood and wealth he acquires. Lighting candles in a dream indicates profit and abundant money. Interpretation of a dream about a candle for a married woman Seeing many candles in a dream for a married woman indicates good news and happy circumstances. If he sees the candle burning, this indicates a desire that will be fulfilled in the near future. If a married woman sees her house filled with candlelight, this indicates the goodness and blessing that falls on the dreamer. Seeing a man traveling with a candle to his home is evidence of his return from travel. Interpretation of a dream about a candle for a pregnant woman Seeing many candles in a dream Pregnant Details of the remaining months of a pregnant woman's pregnancy. Seeing an unlit candle is evidence of the birth of a female. Seeing a lit candle is a sign of a male child. Add the dream you want to interpret in a comment below the article and we will respond to it and clarify it.

title: Interpretation of a dream about a cactus plant

preview.html: The interpretation of seeing a cactus plant in a dream is one of the dreams that have increased searches for it on Google Drive. It is a vision of a cactus plant, and in the following lines we will explain to you the interpretation of seeing a cactus plant in a dream, and you may also be able to meet a snake in a dream, according to the sayings of scholars, because this vision It has many different interpretations that differ from one person to another depending on the presence of cactus, and we will explain to you the interpretation of cactus for a single or married girl and a pregnant woman. Read also: Talking to the dead in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a cactus plant in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a cactus plant in a dream for a married woman. Seeing a cactus conjures different associations and its interpretation varies depending on what If it is smooth or rough. A soft cactus refers to a green cactus plant, and it is a sign of getting rid of the problems and fears that the dreamer was facing. When you see a cactus in a dream and cut it, this is a sign that you are earning money and livelihood by trying to achieve this with hard work and diligence. When a person sees a soft cactus and is happy to see it This is a good omen that the dreamer will complete memorizing the Holy Qur’an and become closer to God Almighty. Planting cactus is a sign that the dreamer will get rid of debts and earn some money to help himself buy his needs. Read also: Pumpkin in a dream. Interpretation of seeing the thorns of the cactus plant in a dream. Cactus thorns are among the things that It has unpleasant interpretations, so you must follow the following to know the correct interpretation: When a person sees cactus thorns growing in front of him, this is evidence of many worries for the fortuneteller. If the fortuneteller is sick and sees a cactus there and sees thorns in it or touches the thorns, this is an indication of the spread of the disease and may lead to Death, and God knows best. When a person removes thorns without injury, this is evidence that the person has removed obstacles and solved problems on his own. If someone offers him an aloe vera plant and he removes the thorns himself, this is a sign that this person is your enemy and you will get rid of his presence and stay away from him until your problems are solved. Read more: Interpretation of the vision of going out without a hijab in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a cactus plant for a single girl. The single girl who sees the cactus plant has many different meanings depending on the girl’s condition. One of these signs is that if a girl sees that she is eating from this cactus and does not suffer from its taste, then this is a sign of the kindness of that girl’s heart and her excessive tenderness for the sake of those close to her. When she touches the cactus and a thorn hurts her, this is evidence that there is someone deceiving her and she must stay away from them. If he removes the thorns Of cactus, this is evidence of success, almost superiority, and freedom from problems. When she sees a cactus plant, it may be a sign of her marriage to someone close to God who will love and protect her. Read also: I saw my husband getting married. The interpretation of seeing a cactus plant for a married woman. The interpretation of seeing a cactus plant varies in A dream depending on whether the woman has problems with her husband in reality or not. When a married woman sees that her husband gave her a cactus plant and it was free of thorns, this indicates the power of love, faith and tenderness for her. When

title: Interpretation of a dream about many monkeys

preview.html: Seeing many monkeys sitting in the dreamer’s house means that there are fears and problems in the dreamer’s life during this time period. Interpretation of seeing many monkeys in a dream for one girlIf an unmarried woman sees in her dream that she sees many monkeys in her house, and she tried to get them out, but she could not It appears that she sees deceivers close to her in her life. And if the unmarried girl tries to stay away from monkeys in a dream and she is happy to stay away from them. It indicates that there are hypocrites that she deals with in her life and she will stay away from them, God willing. It also indicates that the unmarried girl who sees monkeys In a dream, it is very close to her and she did not get rid of it. This is an indication that there are funny people in her life who are trying to harm her. It also explains that an unmarried woman sees herself killing a monkey in a dream. The meaning indicates her complete readiness for a paralyzed and hypocritical person trying to enter her life. See also: Interpretation of seeing a monkey in a dream by Imam Al-SadiqInterpretation of seeing many monkeys in a dream for a married womanIf a married woman dreams that she is sitting next to many monkeys in a dream. This is a sign that there are people who are not good in her life, and they are trying to make her wrong in many things. And if a married woman speaks For monkeys in a dream. Here enemies appear close to her in life, and they are trying to make her fall between her and her husband, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Also, seeing many monkeys in a dream indicates a married woman who has never given birth before. It is an indication that there is someone in her life who is trying to harm her, Many worries happen to her, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Either a married woman is trying to expel many monkeys from her home and she is happy with the dream. This is an indication of her distancing herself from many hypocrites and deceivers in her life. Interpretation of seeing many monkeys in a dream for a divorced woman. If a divorced woman dreams that You see many monkeys in a dream. This indicates the presence of hypocrites in the life of this divorced woman. They will try to harm her psychologically, and God knows best. As for the divorced woman, who is looking for something in the dream to save her from the presence of monkeys in the dream. It explains the presence of disturbing issues and great fears that this dreamer experiences in her life during This time, you are trying to get rid of them, and God is Great and Most Knowing. The divorced woman saw many monkeys in the garden and watched them from afar. This is an indication that there are disabled people hovering around this divorced woman in her life, and she must be careful. What if the divorced woman looked at the monkeys while she was sick from afar in the dream? This is an indication that there are major problems that divorced women experience during this time and that affect them. Read also: Interpretation of seeing a tiger in a dream for single and married women. Interpretation of seeing many monkeys in a dream about a man and its meaning. If the dreamer sees in a dream that there are many monkeys near him and he feels sorry. It indicates the presence of hypocritical and playful people in his life. If the dreamer is trying to escape from monkeys in a dream while they are inside his house. It indicates that there are very deceitful people around him and they are trying to prevent him from making a mistake.

title: Evidence of seeing water in a dream from Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Water in a dream, water is the secret of life and one of the greatest blessings of Allah - Glory be to Him - to His servants and we cannot do without it because of its many benefits for the body. Without it, life would not continue, but does water continue to maintain the same importance in the world of dreams? Is seeing it in a dream beneficial to the dreamer as well or not? Does it have good connotations or something like that? We will learn this in detail in the following lines. Water in a dream The interpretation of water in a dream has many connotations that can be explained through the following: Water in a dream is good and increases sustenance and blessings as a result of the dreamer's fatigue and great effort. Seeing water in a dream means for the seeker of knowledge the extensive knowledge that makes him excel among his peers and obtain the highest grades. Most scholars of interpretation agreed that water in a dream is the benefit that the dreamer receives if he drinks it and benefits from it. The scholar Muhammad bin Sirin believes that watching running water during sleep leads to the end of sadness and fatigue and the absence of sins and transgressions. If the dreamer sees running water in his dream and its smell is bad, this is a sign of illegal work. The man who sees running water in a dream symbolizes that he earns a lot of money. Which has a websiteInterpretation of dreams onlineFrom Google, there are many interpretations and questions about followers that you can see. Water in a dream by Ibn SirinThere are many indications that Ibn Sirin put water in a dream, the most important of which are the following: Water in a dream symbolizes the religion of Islam, science, life, growth and blessings because The lifeline, and God mentioned its benefit in His Holy Book in His Almighty saying: “And among His signs is that you see the earth still, but when We send down upon it water, it quivers and swells. Indeed, He who gives it life is the Giver of Life to the dead. Indeed, He is over all things competent.” God is the greatest truth. If a sick person sees water in a dream, he will be healed, God willing. The student who dreams of water will graduate with distinction and great success, and the unbeliever will repent to God Almighty and atone for his sins. If the water in the dream is polluted, or tastes sour, or has mold, this is a harbinger of evil, corruption, and the bitterness of life. Water in a dream for a single woman A girl seeing pure water in a dream for a single woman indicates that she will be able to achieve her desires after great effort, and the dream may indicate her marriage to a man she loves in whom she finds all the specifications The one who dreams of it and makes it. He makes her happy and offers her kindness and respect. If a girl sees polluted or salty water in a dream, this is a warning against falling into many problems. If a girl walks in clear water during her sleep, this is a sign of her compliance with the commandments of God - Glory be to Him - and her avoidance of committing sins and disobedience. If the water on which the girl walks in the dream is cloudy, this means that she is not good and does not walk according to her whims and does not listen to the opinions of others. Water in a dream for a married woman Clean water in a dream for a married woman symbolizes the psychological peace and happiness that she feels in her life

There is many evidence that Ibn Sirin put water in a dream, the most important of which are the following: Water in a dream symbolizes the religion of Islam, science, life, growth, and blessing because it is the lifeblood, and God mentioned its benefit in His Noble Book in His Almighty saying: “And among His signs is that you You see the earth subdued, but when We send down water upon it, it shakes and swells. Indeed, He who gave it life is the One who gives life to the dead. Indeed, He has power over all things. God is Great. If a sick person sees water in a dream, he will be cured, with permission God. The student who dreams of water will graduate with distinction and great success, and the unbeliever will repent to God Almighty and disbelieve. About his sins. If the water in the dream is polluted, tastes sour, or has mold, then this is a harbinger of evil, corruption, and the bitterness of life. Water in a dream for a single woman. A girl’s vision of pure water in a dream for a single woman indicates that she will be able to achieve her desires after a great effort, and the dream may indicate Until her marriage to a man she loves, she finds in him all the qualities she dreams of and creates. He makes her happy and offers her kindness and respect. If a girl sees polluted or salty water in a dream, this is a warning against falling into many problems. If a girl walks in clear water during her sleep, this is a sign of her compliance with the commandments of God - Glory be to Him - and her avoidance of committing sins and disobedience. If the water on which the girl walks in the dream is turbid, this means that she is not good and does not walk according to her whims and does not listen to the opinions of others. Water in a dream for a married woman. Clean water in a dream for a married woman symbolizes the psychological peace and happiness that she feels in her life.

title: Interpretation of a whale in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a whale in a dream is the focus of our article today. Many people search for a clear interpretation of seeing a whale in a dream, because it is one of the confusing visions that can lead to good or bad, but such visions have many meanings that differ depending on the dreamer, except for the form. And the size of the dream. And the color of the whale and its condition in a dream, and through the following lines in the encyclopedia we will learn about the opinions of major interpretation scholars about seeing a whale in a dream.Interpretation of a whale in a dreamIbn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing a whale in a dream Ibn Sirin says that seeing a whale in a dream indicates that the dreamer is suffering from many problems in Work. Whoever sees in his dream that he rode a whale and controlled it, his dream indicates that he will hold an important position and will be characterized by seriousness. The vision of hunting whales indicates that the dreamer will exploit others and cause them harm. Whoever sees that he is chasing a large whale, this means that he will make a lot of profits And profit in the coming period. If a person dreams that a whale is sleeping in his bed, this means that the dreamer will be overcome by sadness and anxiety. Interpretation of a dream about a whale by Ibn Shaheen, and from the point of view of the scholar Ibn Shaheen, if he sees that a whale is chasing him and surrounding him from all sides, this is evidence that he He suffers from great worries and pain. Seeing a whale in a dream may indicate the strength of the dreamer’s personality and his ability to achieve his ambitions and dreams, and it may indicate his introversion, isolation, and desire to distance himself from others. One of the warning dreams is dreaming of a black whale, because it shows that the dreamer is far from God and commits many things. Of sins, it also appears that he is exposed to many worries and experiences. As for whoever sees himself inside a black whale, this is a sign of God’s satisfaction with the dreamer. Seeing a blue whale means that the dreamer will get rid of his problems and change his life in a positive way. Interpretation of seeing a whale in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi. Al-Nabulsi believes that if If one dreams of a whale in his dream, this means distress, loneliness, and sadness. Whoever sees that the whale in his dream has died, this is good news for him that he will soon hear good and happy news. Seeing a whale riding a whale and swimming with it quickly indicates that the dreamer will succeed in life. If one dreams With a blue whale, his dream indicates that he will achieve the goals he seeks to achieve, which he thought were impossible. Seeing a whale killed means that the dreamer will get rid of the obstacles and difficulties he faces in his life. Whoever sees that he is running away from a whale in fear, this means that he is suffering from many problems, But he cannot confront it and get rid of it. One dream interpretation of a whale: Seeing a whale in a single woman’s dream means that she will achieve her goals in life. If an unmarried woman sees a brown whale in her dream, her dream indicates that she will achieve something that she has been waiting for for a long time. Anyone who sees a whale swimming In his dream, it means that his problems will end soon. Seeing a whale attack in an unmarried woman’s dream indicates the presence of a young man with bad morals who is proposing to her. Interpretation of a married woman seeing a whale in a dream. Seeing a whale in a married woman’s dream means that she will soon become pregnant and give birth to a healthy child. If she sees Matzo woman

title: Interpretation of seeing reading or hearing Surah Al-Mu’minun in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of the vision of reading or listening to Surat Al-Mu’minun in a dream, to know that reading or listening to Surat Al-Mu’minun indicates piety and piety and that the dreamer avoids immorality and immorality among the different interpretations depending on the social status of each person, and the vision of a man also appears in his dream in Surat Al-Mu’minun so that he can enjoy this The man will soon undertake Hajj to the Sacred House of God. We will tell you the full explanation about the vision of reading or listening to Surat Al-Mu’minun dreaming of you in the following lines. Follow us. Interpretation of seeing reading or hearing Surat Al-Mu’minun in a dream for a single woman. Seeing one girl in her dream, which is Surat Al-Mu’minun, indicates that This girl is distinguished by many good qualities and morals. Make the girl stand out from other girls. Also, seeing or hearing Surah Al-Mu’minun in a girl’s dream indicates that this girl will be able to achieve all the dreams and ambitions that she dreamed of reaching and achieving. And when an unmarried girl hears Surat Al-Mu’minun in this dream of hers. Evidence that this girl will be able to successfully and confidently overcome some of the adversities she is exposed to. This indicates that this woman She is characterized by many good qualities. When a married woman sees in her dream that she is reading. This is evidence in Surat Al-Mu’minun that this woman will be saved by the power of God Almighty from the evil that befell her. Hearing a married woman in her dream is mentioned in Surat Al-Mu’minun. That this woman will soon perform Hajj to Holy House of God. But seeing a married woman in her dream that she is reading. Surat Al-Mu’minun next to her husband and this is evidence. The woman will become pregnant soon. Interpretation of seeing reading or hearing Surat Al-Mu’minun in a dream for a pregnant woman. Seeing or hearing a pregnant woman in a dream is mentioned in Surat Al-Mu’minun that this woman’s pregnancy will be easy, He does not suffer from many health problems. Likewise, if a pregnant woman sees this Surah Al-Mu’minun while she is sleeping, this is evidence that this woman will give birth, by God’s command, to a male child. Likewise, if a pregnant woman sees Surat Al-Mu’minun in a dream, then this is what happens. This is evidence that this woman is living a calm and stable marital life. This woman will be saved from evil and many of the conflicts that she would have gone through. When a divorced woman dreams that she is reading Surat Al-Mu’minun next to her ex-husband, this is evidence that this woman will return to her ex-husband again. And this time they will live a stable and quiet life full of affection and compassion. That this person is willing to do good deeds and treat others well, which is something that pleases God Almighty. Also seeing a man in his dream in Surah Al-Muminun indicates that this man will soon have the joy of pilgrimage to the Holy House of God.

title: I dreamed that I was dancing

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing dancing in a dream by Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, Ibn Shaheen, Ibn Kathir, and Imam Al-Sadiq. What is the interpretation of seeing someone I know dancing in a dream? Seeing a sick person dancing in a dream indicates that the dreamer feels constant anxiety and fear due to the deterioration of his health and his suffering from many diseases. Seeing a wife or daughter dancing in a dream is one of the beautiful visions that portends to the one who hears happy and cheerful news about him, such as earning money. A lot of money or a big promotion at work. I dreamed that I was dancing according to Ibn Sirin. Seeing dancing in a dream according to Ibn Sirin is a sign that the dreamer has fallen into great calamities and calamities that have completely destroyed his life, and the patient recovers quickly and enjoys the best health and well-being. Seeing a pregnant woman dancing in a dream indicates that she will be exposed to a major scandal in front of The world, revealing all its secrets, and to the poor woman, in the approaching Gulf and the death of worry and sadness. What is the interpretation of seeing a married woman dancing without music in a dream? Seeing a married woman dancing in a dream is evidence that she and her husband are earning a living with huge amounts of money and wealth through their work. Seeing a married woman dancing In a dream, a sign brings her good and great happiness because of her husband and his family. Seeing a married woman dancing in front of her husband in a dream symbolizes a change in their circumstances for the better, the stability of their married life, and the presence of love and affection between them. Seeing a married woman dancing in a dream shows that she will get a pregnancy that will make her heart happy soon. What is it? Interpretation of a dream about a divorced woman dancing without music? Seeing a divorced woman dancing in front of her ex-husband is a sign of her constant thinking about him and her desire to return to him and start a new life with him. The absolute vision of a divorced woman dancing in front of her friends is an indication of God standing by her side, solving her problems, and losing her worries and sorrows. Seeing her dancing in a divorced woman’s dream is an indication that she It will bring her wealth, kindness and a lot of money in the near future. What is the interpretation of a man who sees a dance in a dream? Seeing a man dancing in a dream is a sign of achieving goals that have been difficult to achieve for a long time. Seeing a man dancing in a dream is an example of humor, fun and love for others. A man sees His wife is dancing in front of him. It indicates the arrival of goodness and livelihood soon. What is the interpretation of seeing a pregnant woman dancing in a dream? Seeing a pregnant woman dancing in a dream is a sign of her happiness and love with her family, and the arrival of a beautiful child to them brings true joy to her and her husband. Watching a pregnant woman dancing with a beautiful and beautiful child indicates The ease and simplicity of her birth and the birth of a healthy child. What is the interpretation of seeing a young man dancing in a dream? Seeing a young man dancing in a dream with his family and companions is a sign that he will come in days full of happiness and full of joy and love. Seeing belly dancing in a young man’s dream is an indication that he has fulfilled all his desires and dreams, such as joining a job. The one he wants or a relationship with the love of his life. Seeing a young man dancing in a dream declares his big thinking about marriage, engagement, and planning to secure his future. We are happy to see the reception of your dreams about “interpretation of the dancing vision” through the comments, and the dream team will interpret your dream, respond, and communicate with you.

title: Interpretation of dreaming of the letter M in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of the letter M in a dream by Ibn Shaheen in detail. The interpretation of this vision depends on the social status of the person who saw the vision, as the interpretation of dreams differs for men, women and single people. You may also be interested in meeting the girl in a dream. In our next article, we will explain the most important connotations and interpretations of the great scholars and interpreters. You may also be interested in meeting the girl in a dream. Be interested in: Shrimp and eating them in a dream. If the dreamer sees an unknown person dying in a dream, this vision may indicate a lot of money, and abundant and legitimate sustenance, that the dreamer will gain. If the dreamer sees himself dying in a dream, If the dreamer sees this vision, but he returns To life after his death, this may indicate his efforts to leave the path of sins and sins that he committed. If a woman sees the death of her husband in a dream, this vision may indicate that a period of anxiety and trouble between the spouses has passed and that they will enjoy stability again. Interpretation of the letter M in The dream by Ibn Shaheen in detail. The chapter on the interpretation of the letter M in a dream by Ibn Shaheen contains many useful topics that enrich the research of those interested and quench the curiosity of the student of knowledge, such as: Seeing coral reefs in a dream indicates many benefits that the dreamer will obtain or a new job that will bring great profits. As for Musk in dreams is evidence of goodness and grace in the dreamer’s home. Scales in a dream are a sign of the dreamer’s justice and maintaining his honesty with people. While a man is driving a nail into a piece of wood, it portends his imminent marriage to a good girl who will help him and protect him. Brushing the hair with a comb in the dream indicates To the end of the approaching fears and the end of the difficulties faced by the dreamer. You may also be interested in: The Snake in a Dream. Interpretation of the vision of death by Ibn Shaheen. Among what was stated in Ibn Shaheen’s interpretation of the letter Meem in detail in a dream is his interpretation of the vision of death and the connotations and signs that accompany it, in which he said: Seeing a person. An unknown person dying in a dream indicates a lawful livelihood and abundant money that the dreamer will gain. As for a man’s dream of his own death and then returning to life, it is an indication of his attempt to sincerely repent for his sins and transgressions. Seeing an enemy dying in a dream means a peace treaty and a settlement of the dispute that leads to the end of hostility. The death of a husband in The dream of a wife portends the end of a major crisis they are experiencing and the stability of their lives again. Seeing the same person dying portends anxiety and sadness in the coming period. Interpretation of seeing a woman in a dreamThe interpretation of seeing a woman in the interpretation of the letter M in a dream was explained by Ibn Shaheen in great detail, and from here it emerged: Seeing a woman in a dream represents One's worldly life and his position in that life. And whoever sees a very beautiful woman in his dream, this is an indication that he will obtain great good from this woman, and this will affect his entire family. An ugly woman in a dream portends serious problems and great difficulties that will come on the path of insight. Seeing A young man seeing a naked woman indicates that he will soon marry a good-natured, very pious girl. While an adulterous woman in a man’s dream expresses the imminent acquisition of good and legitimate sustenance. You may be interested: Distributing food in a dream - Interpretation

title: Seeing broken eggs in a dream and what does it indicate?

preview.html: Seeing broken eggs in a dream: Eggs are very rich in protein and many important nutrients for the body. Seeing eggs in a dream has many interpretations between good and evil. Eggs may indicate that you will get money, but after getting tired and eating raw eggs, it means anxiety and sadness, but cooked eggs are good and indicate good news and the satisfaction of desires, and a broken egg indicates marital and family problems and disputes. Seeing raw and broken eggs in a dream for a married woman. Seeing broken eggs indicates problems. And the troubles that women go through. Seeing broken eggs also indicates bad luck and marital unhappiness. Raw eggs in a dream may indicate exposure to crises, distress, or illness. It also indicates family disputes and disagreements with friends or neighbors. Interpretation of seeing raw egg yolks in a dream: Seeing yourself Eating raw eggs could be a bad vision and hearing sad news. Rotten eggs in a dream indicate corruption of morals, and for a married person, it may indicate the unfairness of children and their disobedience to parents. Eating raw eggs in a dream for an unmarried woman also indicates problems, suffering, or an emotional relationship. Stress or disagreements with her friends. Seeing raw and broken eggs in a dream for a pregnant woman. Seeing broken eggs in a pregnant woman’s dream could be an unfavorable vision and indicates fatigue and pain during pregnancy and childbirth. Seeing eggs collecting indicates the approaching date of birth and good health for herself and the fetus. Seeing eggs indicates Broken raw ones also indicate problems for the fetus and may indicate a miscarriage. Interpretation of a dream about eggs for a widow or divorced woman. Seeing many eggs in a dream for a widow or divorced woman indicates a lot of good and abundant money and good luck in the coming days. Seeing boiled eggs may indicate marriage to a fortuneteller. Seeing yourself carrying boiled eggs or eating them means that wishes will come true and good news will be heard soon. Interpretation of a dream about eggs with yolks: Eggs with two yolks in a dream can be a good vision that indicates good luck, abundant money and abundance. A divorced woman who sees raw eggs but does not eat them indicates Indicates that she will get money or a prestigious job awaiting her. If a married woman dreams of breaking eggs, this indicates her illness, the illness of her children, or marital or family problems. Eggs with two or more saffron, three or four, indicate a good life. Interpretation of a dream: Many egg yolks in one egg. Seeing a young man eating a raw egg with the yolk indicates a problem he faces. Seeing healthy eggs indicates money for a young man. The egg yolk indicates anxiety and sadness. Or the egg yolk indicates that the dreamer will get money, but after fatigue and hardship. Seeing raw egg yolks in a dream for a single woman: If an unmarried girl sees herself eating raw eggs, this is a vision that indicates failure to obtain an academic degree, and seeing broken eggs may indicate failure or cancellation of an engagement. Seeing raw eggs may mean that you are committing sins and

title: Interpretation of a dream about heavy menstruation: seeing a lot of menstrual blood in a dream

preview.html: The meaning of my period in a dream for a single girl, for a married woman, for a pregnant woman, for a divorced woman, for a fiancée, if blood comes out of the vagina at a different time than the vulva that I dreamed about. Blood on my clothes with or without pain by Ibn Sirin and others. Seeing heavy menstrual bleeding from the vagina in a dream is seeing a woman’s blood. Flowing profusely in a dream is an indication that this woman’s circumstances in real life will change for the better, God willing. If there is anxiety and distress in her, this anxiety will go away, and that distress will turn into spaciousness and comfort. If this woman lives in sadness and pain, she will find happiness in her coming days, God willing. And she is freed from these sorrows. Seeing a pregnant woman when she sees menstrual blood coming out of her vagina in excessive amounts, but without the presence of pain and suffering in the dream, then her vision indicates the health and safety of her fetus and that it was born in a normal and healthy condition, God willing. And the unmarried girl who dreams that she is menstruating and bleeding from her vagina abundantly, will appear. Her vision is the joy, happiness and goodness that this girl will find in her coming days, as if she is married to a young man and her life is full of joy and happiness or she is getting what she wants and seeks. It is accomplished. A married woman sees menstrual blood from her vagina. Frequent visions indicate the occurrence of happy things that bring happiness to this woman’s soul in reality, such as getting rid of some problems and life’s fears, or pregnancy, childbirth, and living in her husband’s house. Homeland in peace and tranquility without suffering from the hardships of life, God willing. If this bleeding is accompanied by pain and torment in the dream, the vision may indicate the house and the new home that this wife will move to with her husband and children, if she has children, with joy and happiness. Seeing heavy menstrual blood on the A woman in a dream: This vision may indicate some sins committed by that woman. God. But if the dreamer is a man and sees that he is menstruating until blood comes out of his vagina, then his vision indicates the sins and disobedience that the dreamer committed in his real life, and that he had previously forbidden sexual intercourse with a woman. In it, he committed the crime of adultery and he must repent to God Almighty for these sins and disobedience, otherwise it was bad. If your menstrual period is approaching or you are currently suffering from it, then your dream may be a reflection of your subconscious mind, nothing more, because this dream is a familiar thing in your daily life. He says Some commentators say that if you see blood in your underwear and this is the result of your menstrual cycle, this means that you will get rid of stress and anxiety, and this symbolizes the end of the period of difficult problems and the beginning of the relaxation phase. If you are currently menstruating and dreaming that you are on your period, your dream indicates that there is new life energy within you that will make you enjoy your life.If you are pregnant and see that you are on your period, your dream indicates that you need to slow down and take care of yourself, so you are not allowed to rush. To dream that you are drinking menstrual blood means that you are still living in the past and you need to get rid of it in order to move towards a new present and a better future. Interpretation of menstruation in a dream: Menstruation in a dream indicates committing a crime.
